itemDisplayName: Deploy a simple VM Scale Set with Linux VMs and a Jumpbox, enable encryption on Linux VM Scale Set
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple VM Scale Set of Linux VMs using the latest image version.  This template also deploys a jumpbox with a public IP address in the same virtual network. You can connect to the jumpbox via this public IP address, then connect from there to VMs in the scale set via private IP addresses. This template enables encryption on the VM Scale Set of Linux VMs.
summary: This template deploys a VM Scale Set of Linux VMs with a jumpbox, enables encryption on VMSS.
